key.description: The key whose value needs to be templated. For nested values, use a YAML dot notation path.

value.description: The new value for the key.

path.description: Path at which the Helm chart can be found.

outPath.description: OutPath to write the rendered manifests to. If it points to a .yaml or .yml file, the rendered manifests will be written to that file. If it points to a directory, the rendered manifests will be written to this directory joined with the chart name.

releaseName.description: ReleaseName to use for the rendered manifests.

useReleaseName.description: Whether to use the release name in the output path (instead of the chart name). This only has an effect if outPath is set to a directory.

namespace.description: Namespace to use for the rendered manifests.

valuesFiles.description: ValuesFiles to use for rendering the Helm chart.

setValues.description: SetValues to use for rendering the Helm chart.

includeCRDs.description: Whether to include CRDs in the rendered manifests.

disableHooks.description: Whether to disable hooks in the rendered manifests.

skipTests.description: Whether to skip tests when rendering the manifests.

kubeVersion.description: KubeVersion allows for passing a specific Kubernetes version to use when rendering the manifests.

apiVersions.description: APIVersions allows a manual set of supported API Versions to be passed when rendering the manifests.
